activities.loc: Courtroom D, Fourth Floor - North Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. CJ Michael Hall

records.addlTxt: Calendar call on January 12, 2023 at 10:00 am.

4:12 PM Defendant CJ Michael Hall appeared by video.  Attorney Shanna Sanders appeared by video for CJ Michael Hall.  Prosecuting attorney David S Olson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives preliminary hearing freely and voluntarily.  Court accepts waiver and binds the Defendant over for the filing of an Information. Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived. Defendants Attorney pleads not guilty and jury trial to be set.
Preliminary hearing on August 29, 2022 at 04:15 pm.

Activity:  Adjourned initial appearance  
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

1:48 PM  Prosecuting attorney David S Olson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant CJ Michael Hall appeared by audio.  Attorney Shanna Sanders appeared by video for CJ Michael Hall.  Complaint copy to attorney.  Reading waived.  Preliminary hearing requested by zoom.  Bond continued.
Return of property hearing scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 04:15 pm.
Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Supervision Report

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on August 17, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

No possession of drug paraphernalia. Not to consume or possess a controlled substance without a valid prescription and in prescribed amounts only. Court orders Level 4 supervision through JusticePoint.  Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody.

3:29 PM Prosecuting attorney Emmeline Lee and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant CJ Michael Hall appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Colin T Nicholson appeared by video for CJ Michael Hall. Defendant address and date of birth verified. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Cash bond set of $200 with conditions. No possession of drug paraphernalia. Not to consume or possess a controlled substance without a valid prescription and in prescribed amounts only. Court orders Level 4 supervision through JusticePoint.  Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
